title: DAK: David Alexander Kopelman
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, David Withers and ACMI
brief_description: yDAK doesn’t consider himself an artist, he just “dabbles and makes stuff”. Despite this his scrap-metal sculptures and decorative gates can be found throughout the neighbourhoods, businesses and galleries of the Bass Coast in south-eastern Victoria. Cape Woolamai’s very own mo-hawked road warrior has a plasma cutter and he’s not afraid to use it!
